Object.Field: IGNORE_ERROR:UPDATE SNP_MODEL SET I_TRT_KCM = NULL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT I_TRT_KCM FROM SNP_TRT WHERE SNP_MODEL.I_TRT_KCM = SNP_TRT.I_TRT)

IGNORE_ERROR:UPDATE SNP_STEP SET I_TABLE = NULL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT I_TABLE FROM SNP_TABLE WHERE SNP_STEP.I_TABLE = SNP_TABLE.I_TABLE)

ALTER TABLE SNP_MOD_FOLDER ADD CONSTRAINT PK_MOD_FOLDER PRIMARY KEY (I_MOD_FOLDER)
